parameters: Why are you here all by yourself!?
"…everyone went out into town selling 'artisanal goods'
"I want to be of assistance, too.
"Then, why don't you just clean…or clean…?
Are there…other things you can do to help instead?
Wandering around the forest is too risky…!
and there's nothing more to clean, right?
there's nothing I can really do to help out.
"But, I overheard them talking about something.
that everyone uses when mining for ore
is out of almost out of stock apparently.
leaving without telling anyone like this!
do you think they will be happy about this!?
I don't want to just be a burden to them…!
with a whole bunch of evil spirits and ghosts!
shouldn't come too close as long as I'm here…
so I'll stick around for you!
there's no way I would ever step foot here…
Yes, leave it up to me
Queen Dressed as a Witch (※Henceforth, Witch)
How dare you fail to kill Schnee…
she must be gathering mushrooms in this forest here
Something I didn't know about before!
"Though I am her mother-in-law, if I had killed her,
I would have lost my own beauty as well…
In other words, I shall not kill Schnee
but instead just make her lose her nobility!
"I shall find that 'Massive Room' that Schnee is looking for
and cast a spell of despair on it!
CAM DISABLE //追従カメラリセット
※ヒロインイベントのイベントIDは１番にしておくこと。
そうしないと座標取得時に別イベントを拾ってしまう。
